member.name: M:OrchardCore.Deployment.Remote.Controllers.ImportRemoteInstanceController.Import(OrchardCore.Deployment.Remote.ViewModels.ImportViewModel)
member.remarks: We ignore the AFT as the service is called from external applications (they can't have valid ones) and we use a private API key to secure its calls.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Deployment.Remote.Services.RemoteInstanceService.LoadRemoteInstanceListAsync
member.summary: Loads the remote instances document from the store for updating and that should not be cached.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Deployment.Remote.Services.RemoteInstanceService.GetRemoteInstanceListAsync
member.summary: Gets the remote instances document from the cache for sharing and that should not be updated.
